analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutta
Evaṁ me sutaṁ—

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.

analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “saḷāyatanavibhaṅgaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi.
analyzed: saḷāyatana vibhaṅgam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbāni cha

original: chattiṁsa sattapadā veditabbā, tatra idaṁ nissāya idaṁ pajahatha, tayo satipaṭṭhānā
analyzed: chattisa satta padā veditabbā tatra idam nissāya idam pajahatha tayo sati paṭṭhānā

original: yadariyo sevati yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati, so vuccati yoggācariyānaṁ
analyzed: yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati so vuccati

analyzed: anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathī iti

analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni iti

analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: cha phassakāyā veditabbā’ti—

analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā somanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati.

original: Sotena saddaṁ sutvā …pe…
analyzed: sotena saddam sutvā pe

original: ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā …
analyzed: ghānena gandham ghāyitvā

original: jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā …
analyzed: jivhāya rasam sāyitvā

original: kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusitvā …
analyzed: kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā

original: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya somanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati.
analyzed: manasā dhammam viññāya somanassa ṭṭhānīyam dhammam upavicarati domanassa ṭṭhānīyam dhammam upavicarati upekkhā ṭṭhānīyam dhammam upavicarati

original: Iti cha somanassūpavicārā, cha domanassūpavicārā, cha upekkhūpavicārā, aṭṭhārasa manopavicārā veditabbā’ti—

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Chattiṁsa sattapadā veditabbā’ti—
analyzed: chattisa satta padā veditabbā ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Cha gehasitāni somanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni, cha gehasitāni domanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni, cha gehasitā upekkhā, cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā.
analyzed: cha geha sitāni somanassāni cha nekkhamma sitāni somanassāni cha geha sitāni domanassāni cha nekkhamma sitāni domanassāni cha geha sitā upekkhā cha nekkhamma sitā upekkhā

original: Tattha katamāni cha gehasitāni somanassāni?
analyzed: tattha katamāni cha gehasitāni somanassāni

analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyānam rūpānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam manoramānam loka āmisa paṭisayuttāna

analyzed: paṭilābham vā paṭilābhataḥ samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdha pubbam atītam niruddha

analyzed: vipariṇatam samanussarato uppajjati somanassa

analyzed: kāya viññeyyānam phoṭṭhabbānam

analyzed: manaḥ viññeyyānam dhammānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam pe somanassa

analyzed: yam evarūpam somanassam idam vuccati gehasitam somanassa

analyzed: passataḥ uppajjati somanassa

analyzed: ca sabbe te dhammā aniccāḥ dukkhāḥ vipariṇāma dhammā ti evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya

original: passato uppajjati upekkhā.
analyzed: passataḥ uppajjati upekkhā

original: Yā evarūpā upekkhā, dhammaṁ sā ativattati.
analyzed: yā evarūpā upekkhā dhammam sā ativattati

original: Tasmā sā upekkhā ‘nekkhammasitā’ti vuccati.
analyzed: tasmā sā upekkhā nekkhammasitā ati vuccati

original: Imā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā.
analyzed: imāḥ cha nekkhamma sitāḥ upekkhā

original: ‘Chattiṁsa sattapadā veditabbā’ti—
analyzed: chattisa satta padā veditabbā ati

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Tatra idaṁ nissāya idaṁ pajahathā’ti—
analyzed: tatra idam nissāya idam pajahatha ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ; Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha gehasitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yāni cha nekkhamma sitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha geha sitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha tāni samatikkamatha

original: Evametesaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametesaṁ samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etesam pahānam hoti evam etesam samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha gehasitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yāni cha nekkhamma sitāni domanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha geha sitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha tāni samatikkamatha

original: Evametesaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametesaṁ samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etesam pahānam hoti evam etesam samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā tā nissāya tā āgamma, yā cha gehasitā upekkhā tā pajahatha tā samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yāḥ cha nekkhamma sitāḥ upekkhāḥ tā nissāya tāḥ āgamma yāḥ cha geha sitāḥ upekkhāḥ tā pajahatha tāḥ samatikkamatha

original: Evametāsaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametāsaṁ samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etāsam pahānam hoti evam etāsam samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yāni cha nekkhamma sitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha nekkhamma sitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha tāni samatikkamatha

original: Evametesaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametesaṁ samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etesam pahānam hoti evam etesam samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā tā nissāya tā āgamma yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yā cha nekkhamma sitāḥ upekkhā tā nissāya tāḥ āgamma yāni cha nekkhamma sitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha tāni samatikkamatha

original: Evametesaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, evametesaṁ samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etesam pahānam hoti evam etesam samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā, atthi upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave upekkhā nānattā nānatta sitā atthi upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā

original: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā?
analyzed: katamā ca bhikkhave upekkhā nānattā nānatta sitā

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu, atthi saddesu, atthi gandhesu, atthi rasesu, atthi phoṭṭhabbesu—
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave upekkhā rūpesu atthi saddesu atthi gandhesu atthi rasesu atthi phoṭṭhabbesu

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā.
analyzed: bhikkhave upekkhā nānattā nānatta sitā

original: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā?
analyzed: katamā ca bhikkhave upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitā, atthi viññāṇañcāyatananissitā, atthi ākiñcaññāyatananissitā, atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitā—
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave upekkhā ākāsānañca āyatana nissitā atthi viññāṇañcāyatana nissitā atthi ākiñcaññāyatana nissitā atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatana nissitā

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā.
analyzed: bhikkhave upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṁ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā taṁ nissāya taṁ āgamma yāyaṁ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā taṁ pajahatha, taṁ samatikkamatha.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yā ayam upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā tam nissāya tam āgamma yā ayam upekkhā nānattā nānatta sitā tam pajahatha tam samatikkamatha

original: Evametissā pahānaṁ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etissā pahānam hoti evam etissā samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Atammayataṁ, bhikkhave, nissāya atammayataṁ āgamma yāyaṁ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā taṁ pajahatha, taṁ samatikkamatha.
analyzed: atammayata bhikkhave nissāya atammayatam āgamma yā ayam upekkhā ekattā ekatta sitā tam pajahatha tam samatikkamatha

original: Evametissā pahānaṁ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etissā pahānam hoti evam etissā samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: ‘Tatra idaṁ nissāya idaṁ pajahathā’ti—
analyzed: tatra idam nissāya idam pajahatha ati

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’ti—
analyzed: tayo satipaṭṭhānā yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ;
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta

original: kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṁ upādāya:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave satthā sāvakānam dhammaṃ deseti anukampakaḥ hita īsī anukampam upādāya

original: ‘idaṁ vo hitāya, idaṁ vo sukhāyā’ti.
analyzed: idam vaḥ hitāya idam vaḥ sukhāya ati

original: Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṁ odahanti, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti.
analyzed: tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti na sotam odahanti na aññā cittam upaṭṭhapenti vokkamma ca satthu sāsanā vattanti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṁ paṭisaṁvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave tathāgataḥ na ca iva anatta manaḥ hoti na ca anatta manatam paṭisavedeti anavassutaḥ ca viharati sataḥ sampajāno

original: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
analyzed: idam bhikkhave paṭhamam sati paṭṭhānam yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṁ upādāya:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave satthā sāvakānam dhammaṃ deseti anukampakaḥ hita īsī anukampam upādāya

original: ‘idaṁ vo hitāya, idaṁ vo sukhāyā’ti.
analyzed: idam vaḥ hitāya idam vaḥ sukhāya ati

original: Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṁ odahanti, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti;
analyzed: tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti na sotam odahanti na aññā cittam upaṭṭhapenti vokkamma ca satthu sāsanā vattanti

original: ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti, sotaṁ odahanti, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti.
analyzed: ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti sotam odahanti aññā cittam upaṭṭhapenti na ca vokkamma satthu sāsanā vattanti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave tathāgataḥ na ca iva anatta manaḥ hoti na ca anatta manatam paṭisavedeti

original: na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: na ca atta manaḥ hoti na ca atta manatam paṭisavedeti

original: Anattamanatā ca attamanatā ca—
analyzed: an atta mana tā ca atta mana tā ca

original: tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
analyzed: tat ubhayam abhinivajjetvā upekkhakaḥ viharati sataḥ sampajānaḥ

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dutiyam sati paṭṭhānam yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṁ upādāya:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave satthā sāvakānam dhammaṃ deseti anukampakaḥ hita īsī anukampam upādāya

original: ‘idaṁ vo hitāya, idaṁ vo sukhāyā’ti.
analyzed: idam vaḥ hitāya idam vaḥ sukhāya ati

original: Tassa sāvakā sussūsanti, sotaṁ odahanti, aññācittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti.
analyzed: tassa sāvakā sussūsanti sotam odahanti aññācittam upaṭṭhapenti na ca vokkamma satthu sāsanā vattanti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṁvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave tathāgataḥ atta manaḥ ca iva hoti atta manatam ca paṭisavedeti anavassutaḥ ca viharati sataḥ sampajāno

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiyaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave tatiyam sati paṭṭhānam yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati

original: ‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’ti—
analyzed: tayo satipaṭṭhānā yat ariyaḥ sevati yat ariyaḥ sevamāno satthā gaṇam anusāsitum arahati iti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘So vuccati yoggācariyānaṁ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti—
analyzed: so vuccati yogga ācariyānam anuttaro purisa damma sārathī iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṁyeva disaṁ dhāvati—
analyzed: hatthi damakena bhikkhave hatthi dammaḥ sāritaḥ ekayā iva disam dhāvati

original: puratthimaṁ vā pacchimaṁ vā uttaraṁ vā dakkhiṇaṁ vā.
analyzed: puratthimam vā pacchimam vā uttaram vā dakkhiṇam vā

original: Assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo sārito ekaññeva disaṁ dhāvati—
analyzed: assadamakena bhikkhave assa dammaḥ sāritaḥ ekaññā iva disam dhāvati

original: puratthimaṁ vā pacchimaṁ vā uttaraṁ vā dakkhiṇaṁ vā.
analyzed: puratthimam vā pacchimam vā uttaram vā dakkhiṇam vā

original: Godamakena, bhikkhave, godammo sārito ekaññeva disaṁ dhāvati—
analyzed: godamakena bhikkhave godammaḥ sāritaḥ ekaññā iva disam dhāvati

original: puratthimaṁ vā pacchimaṁ vā uttaraṁ vā dakkhiṇaṁ vā.
analyzed: puratthimam vā pacchimam vā uttaram vā dakkhiṇam vā

original: Tathāgatena hi, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati.
analyzed: tathāgatena hi bhikkhave arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisa dammaḥ sāritaḥ aṭṭha disāḥ vidhāvati

original: Rūpī rūpāni passati—
analyzed: rūpī rūpāni passati

original: ayaṁ ekā disā;
analyzed: ayam ekā disā

original: ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati—
analyzed: ajjhattam a rūpa saññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati

original: ayaṁ dutiyā disā;
analyzed: ayam dutiyā disā

original: subhantveva adhimutto hoti—
analyzed: adhimuttaḥ hoti

original: ayaṁ tatiyā disā;
analyzed: ayam tatiyā disā

original: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
analyzed: sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: ayaṁ catutthī disā;
analyzed: ayam catutthī disā

original: sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
analyzed: sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: ayaṁ pañcamī disā;
analyzed: ayam pañcamī disā

original: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
analyzed: sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: ayaṁ chaṭṭhī disā;
analyzed: ayam chaṭṭhī disā

original: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati—
analyzed: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: ayaṁ sattamī disā;
analyzed: ayam sattamī disā

original: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati—
analyzed: sabbasas nevasaññā nāsañña āyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharati

original: ayaṁ aṭṭhamī disā.
analyzed: ayam aṭṭhamī disā

original: Tathāgatena, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito imā aṭṭha disā vidhāvati.
analyzed: tathāgatena bhikkhave arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisa dammaḥ sāritaḥ imāḥ aṭṭha disāḥ vidhāvati

original: So vuccati: ‘yoggācariyānaṁ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti—
analyzed: so vuccati yogga ācariyānam anuttaro purisa damma sārathī iti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vuttan ti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: saḷāyatana vibhaṅga suttam niṭṭhitam sattama
